commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
1. Login endpoint which will take username, password and gives us back a login and refresh token.
http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/login
method : POST
data : {
    "email": "amarat@gmail.com",
    "password": "password123"
}



2. Create endpoint to get new login token using the refresh token
http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/refresh-token
method : POST
data : {
  "refresh_token": "hEBJUvKXf9R8Vna7VDS3eG8XgYraDR3Vyd6DaGRlULtpyl8Tu0V0ykifTude"
}


3. Create endpoint to get user info 
http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/users 
method : GET
herader :-
params : Authorization : Bearer Token
Ex : 	Authorization : Bearer 15|oFydm1MlzERWSjTanmY8EZRH9CfDFxTx0RzfmeHQ432d384f


5. Create endpoint to create a user and store a hashed password.
http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/insert-user
method : POST
data : {
  "name": "test",
  "email": "test@gmail.com",
  "password": "12345678",
  "password_confirmation": "12345678"
}


6. Create endpoint to get single device info
http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/devices/{{id}}
method : GET
herader :-
params : Authorization : Bearer Token
Ex : 	Authorization : Bearer 15|oFydm1MlzERWSjTanmY8EZRH9CfDFxTx0RzfmeHQ432d384f
